text: This place is located in a small plaza. Very nice and pleasant staff and owner. great tasting food and great service. Will def. be back for more.

I give this place 2 stars because the food is quite good. The service is terrible. My fianc√© and I order take out from here quite frequently - the lady that answers the phone is extremely rude. She is very snippy and whenever we ask questions acts as though we are an inconvenience. We only order here if we are desperate.
We love this place always fast And friendly service also they have the best pirogies it's a staple when we go out for breakfast.
